document.full_text: two of the managers in the final four of the champions league, jose mourinho and alex ferguson, can tie the former liverpool coach bob paisley's record of three european cups by lifting the trophy this month.
document.title: milestone beckons for two champions league coaches
lines_and_colors: two of the managers in the final four of the champions league, jose mourinho and alex ferguson, can tie the former liverpool coach bob paisley's record of three european cups by lifting the trophy this month.
